label: clinical_signal_03_dx_vaccine_immunogenicity_002
content:
## 2024-03-11 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 55
- Active: 55
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 3
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 0

### Enrollment By Dose Group
- Low Dose: 14
- Mid Dose: 14
- High Dose: 13
- Placebo: 14

### Immunogenicity By Group
- Low Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 24.1
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 6.0
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 14.3
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 4.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 32.3
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 10.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 65.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 15.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 42.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 11.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 5.8
- Mid Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 40.1
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 9.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 17.6
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 6.4
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 67.5
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 16.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 94.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 74.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 18.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 11.3
- High Dose
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 50.5
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 13.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 24.9
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 8.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 82.0
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 22.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 125.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 33.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 95.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 24.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 19.9
- Placebo
  - IgG Titer (GMU) Mean: 6.7
  - IgG Titer (GMU) SD: 1.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) Mean: 0.2
  - IgM Titer (GMU) SD: 0.8
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 Mean: 1.3
  - Neutralizing Ab ID50 SD: 2.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 5.0
  - CD4 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 3.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) Mean: 2.0
  - CD8 Response (SFC/10^6) SD: 2.0
  - Seroconversion Percentage: 0

### Injection Site Reactions
- Pain Percentage: 44.4
- Erythema Percentage: 12.8
- Swelling Percentage: 6.8
- Induration Percentage: 10.9
- Mean Pain Duration (Hours): 12.5

### Systemic Reactogenicity
- Fever Percentage: 13.9
- Fatigue Percentage: 43.5
- Myalgia Percentage: 24.5
- Headache Percentage: 29.3
- Chills Percentage: 7.2

### Safety Labs
- WBC (K) Mean: 7.6
- WBC (K) SD: 2.0
- Lymphocyte Percentage Mean: 37.7
- Lymphocyte Percentage SD: 5.2
- Neutrophil Percentage Mean: 61.7
- Neutrophil Percentage SD: 9.6
- Platelets (K) Mean: 250
- Platelets (K) SD: 42
- CRP (mg/L) Mean: 5.0
- CRP (mg/L) SD: 1.2
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.1
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 0.8

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: VI-AE-0287, Description: lymphadenopathy, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-0212, Description: chills, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: high_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-0254, Description: injection site pain, Grade: 2, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: low_dose
- AE ID: VI-AE-0286, Description: lymphadenopathy, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Dose Group: mid_dose

### Events
- Site 03 monitoring visit, 1 minor findings
- T-cell assay batch B02 processed, results QC'd

### Notes
- Week 2: Immunogenicity assessments on schedule. 55 subjects enrolled across dose groups. Reactogenicity profiles consistent with prior weeks.
